title: The Ecology of agriculture
creator_contributor_role: Agricultural Council of Denmark, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Agricultural chemicals
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Insect pests - Control
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Soil conservation
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Soil ecology
description: Aims to promote the use of various agricultural methods which emphasise the scientific approach. Notes the importance of nutrients in the soil: the damage caused by mildew and pests; the need for the use of sprays; the damage caused by excessive spraying; and the development of strains of pests resistant to sprays.
